about.details:
Incorporated in 2012, Yudiz Solutions Limited is engaged in the business of providing IT solutions and consultancy services. Yudiz Solutions Limited is a digital transformation and technology services company.

The services include mobile app development, game development, Blockchain, AR/ VR, web development, Website design & Development, Website Maintenance & Support, E-Commerce Web Apps and Portal Development, Mobile App Prototype Development, Hybrid Apps Development, Android/iOS App Development, PC/Mobile Game Development, Digital Marketing, White Label Product Development and more.

Yudiz Solutions Limited also provides various solutions in Mobile, Web, AR/VR, UI/UX and IoT through integrating trending technologies. The company's platforms are News Platform, E-commerce Bidding Platform, On-Demand Services Platform, VR Training platform, Upskilling Industry specific VR platform, HR Intelligence software and more.

Competitive Strength

  • Seasoned management team with domain expertise supported by a professional workforce
  • Integrated business model offering one-stop-shop solutions
  • Low attrition rate

faqs.question: What is the Yudiz Solutions IPO?
faqs.answer:
Yudiz Solutions IPO is a SME IPO of 2717600 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹44.84 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹165 per share. The minimum order quantity is 800.

The IPO opens on August 4, 2023, and closes on August 8, 2023.

Mas Services Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Yudiz Solutions IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Yudiz Solutions IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Yudiz Solutions IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Yudiz Solutions IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Yudiz Solutions IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Yudiz Solutions IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Yudiz Solutions IPO opens on August 4, 2023 and closes on August 8, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Yudiz Solutions IPO?
faqs.answer: Yudiz Solutions IPO lot size is 800, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,32,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Yudiz Solutions IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Yudiz Solutions IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Yudiz Solutions IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Yudiz Solutions IPO will be done on Friday, August 11, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, August 17, 2023. Check the Yudiz Solutions IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Yudiz Solutions IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Yudiz Solutions IPO listing date is on Thursday, August 17, 2023.

subscriptionStatus.summary: The Yudiz Solutions IPO is subscribed 5.03 times on August 8 2023 7:29:00 PM (Day 3). The public issue subscribed 6.41 times in the retail category 2.81 times in the QIB category and 4.77 times in the NII category. Check Day by Day Subscription Details (Live Status)
